name: @creditkarma/dynamic-config
description: Dynamic Config for Node.js backed by Consul and Vault

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.pretest:integration: rimraf dist/tests/integration/config && cp -r src/tests/integration/config dist/tests/integration/config && npm run docker
scripts.test:integration: wait-on --timeout 20000 http://localhost:8510 http://localhost:8211 && node dist/tests/integration/bootstrap.js && lab --timeout 15000 --verbose -l -S dist/tests/integration/*.spec.js

author: Credit Karma
